content.description:
Käthe Kollwitz, German artist, March of the Weavers, 1897

In the Public Domain

Kollwitz produced this engraving after watching a play about a famous strike by German weavers in the 1840s
content.question: Kollwitz’ depiction of workers and their families is best explained as a rejection of

choices.label: the Romantic emphasis on heightened emotion and individualism
naturalistic depictions of everyday life characteristic of the Northern Renaissance
dramatic portrayals of religious events characteristic of the Baroque period
the Neoclassical use of stories and motifs from the ancient world

content.answer: the Romantic emphasis on heightened emotion and individualism

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
